[Author](/docs/phil/people/Richard Rorty.html)


> The lectures in this volume attempt to envisage what philosophy would be like if our culture became secularized through and through—if the idea of obedience to a non-human authority were to disappear completely.

— [Pragmatism - A View](/docs/phil/works/Pragmatism - A View.html), Preface
